overview: Our young nurses are back in a second volume, and reveal all their secrets! Lola lurks in the hospital corridors in search of interns to seduce and finds a young man accompanied by his teacher. Kate, home care nurse, travels far and wide each day to the bedside of her patients. But opening her thighs for the patient of the day is well worth the trip! Night nurse Tina welcomes the firefighters from the station next door with a strong sense of duty. Lola and Candybelle take advantage of an outside call to have the vehicle stopped in the middle of the job, and let their colleagues bang them on the bench seats. In the garden of the private clinic where she works, Ana joins two nurses on a well-deserved break and soon launches into a threesome. This incredible trip finishes with Nikita and Alexa, two free-spirited nurses who come across a patient jerking off in his bed. These dedicated workers aren't offended in the slightest and make it their duty to liberate the poor guy!
title: Nurses Anthology 2
